# Introduction and Data Description

This document will guide you through the steps to produce a network analysis in R to examine the changes of Santander bikes' usage between the monthly period of August 2019 and August 2020.

List data involved:

1. Bike journey data
  [Here](https://cycling.data.tfl.gov.uk/)
  + August 2019
  + August 2020
2. Bike station locations
  [Data here](https://www.whatdotheyknow.com/request/request_for_location_of_santande#incoming-1572474)
